tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE historical_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  year INT,
  month INT,
  budget DECIMAL,
  expenses DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Budget_Plans (
    plan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_name STRING NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    total_budget DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Expenses (
    expense_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_id UUID REFERENCES Budget_Plans(plan_id),
    expense_date DATE,
    category STRING,
    amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Financial_Analysis (
    analysis_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_id UUID REFERENCES Budget_Plans(plan_id),
    analysis_date DATE,
    projected_savings DECIMAL,
    actual_savings DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Budgets ( 
 budget_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 year INT, 
 amount DECIMAL 
)

CREATE TABLE Expenditures ( 
 expenditure_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 budget_id INT REFERENCES Budgets(budget_id), 
 category VARCHAR(50), 
 amount DECIMAL 
)

CREATE TABLE Revenue ( 
 revenue_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 year INT, 
 amount DECIMAL 
)

CREATE TABLE Reports ( 
 report_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 year INT, 
 description TEXT 
)
